short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take back control of your email

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**Note: Google seems to be blocking the app for reasons unknown ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è We have applied to Google again for verification. The extension isn't usable for new users till that is approved.**

ZenMail is a new approach to email -- a way to take back control of your email.

It is inspired by great works of "Hey" team. This extension adds these features directly on top of Gmail.

‚ú® Features ‚ú®

‚úÖ  Email Screener to automatically screen emails from first time or unknown sender -- keep only the emails you care about in Inbox (Inbox Zero üí™)

‚úÖ  One click workflows to automatically route incoming emails to **Skip Inbox**, **Feed**, **PaperTrail** or any of your existing labels

‚úÖ  Integrated with your current workflow and Gmail labels / filters

‚úÖ  Support for multiple gmail/g-suite accounts

‚úÖ  100% Privacy: Uses Gmail APIs directly from your browser and no data is transferred outside your browser.


**Privacy**
We care deeply about privacy. We do NOT collect or send any information. All the communication from the chrome extension is done directly from chrome to Google using Gmail APIs. No information about you ever passes through any of our servers. 

Feedback / Bugs: 
Please email hello@zenmailhq.com with any feedback, feature requests or bug reports. üôè
